page.title: 07Churches
page.content: In Accrington there are many different religions. Therefore there are a number of churches. Altogether in block are about twelve churches. There are Christians,Moslems and Hindus. Most churches are very old but some quite new,such as the New Jerusalem churches. Some people in Accrington go to church every Sunday and enjoy going but quite a few do not.A few people think very highly of religion,but quite a few people not believe in God at all. A lot of people think that God can help them in times when they are feeling depressed and sad. Some people dnot have the time to go to church but still believe in God.
